body:
Comment 2: 
This would be trivial to change. In the same vein, expression within [] brackets should
arguably be handled like expressions in () parentheses. Etc.

The main reason for suspending this for the time being is the unnecessary churn it
introduces. We may decide down the road that gofmt's formatting is updated (e.g. with a
new release) at which point issues like this can be addressed.
